variants.Description in input context: This variant is pathogenic and causes a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293T cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was undetectable for the variant NM_000546.5:c.791G>A.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type TP53 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% on day 7.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% on day 7.
